dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...so, this update from, uh, Kazakhstan's Ministry of Healthcare, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so, this update from, uh, Kazakhstan's Ministry of Healthcare, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Healthcare has provided an update on the current epidemiological situation in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And it's like, all about ARVI.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And it's like, all about A R V I.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Committee of Sanitary and Epidemiological Control, the epidemiological situation regarding acute respiratory viral infections (ARVI) in the country remains stable.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, stable, apparently. Which, um, is good news?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, stable, apparently. Which, um, is good news?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the epidemiological situation regarding acute respiratory viral infections (ARVI) in the country remains stable.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally good news! They said like, 185,594 cases last week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally good news! They said like, one hundred eighty five thousand, five hundred ninety four cases last week.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the past week, 185,594 cases of ARVI were recorded in the republic, which is at the same level as the previous week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and that’s, uh, the same level as the week before.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and that's, uh, the same level as the week before.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the past week, 185,594 cases of ARVI were recorded in the republic, which is at the same level as the previous week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Which is wild, but also, like, stable.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Which is wild, but also, like, stable.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And a twenty percent decrease compared to last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And a twenty percent decrease compared to last year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Compared to the same period last year, there has been a 20 percent decrease in incidence

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I caught that too! That’s, like, actually huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I caught that too! That's, like, actually huge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Super huge! And no new types of viruses, which, thank goodness.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Super huge! And no new types of viruses, which, thank goodness.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Regarding new types of viruses, the committee reported that none had been detected.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Thank goodness indeed! You know, that’s what always worries me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thank goodness indeed! You know, that's what always worries me.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Me too! Like, a new one popping up? No thanks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Me too! Like, a new one popping up? No thanks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But then, um, did you see the very end bit? About the bats?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But then, um, did you see the very end bit? About the bats?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, yes! Chinese virologists, new coronavirus.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, yes! Chinese virologists, new coronavirus.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, we reported that Chinese virologists had identified a new coronavirus in bats capable of infecting humans similarly to COVID-19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Capable of infecting humans, like COVID-19!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Capable of infecting humans, like COVIDminus nineteen!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, we reported that Chinese virologists had identified a new coronavirus in bats capable of infecting humans similarly to COVID-19.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that’s the part that, um, always kinda gets me, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's the part that, um, always kinda gets me, you know?
